mapper.select: SELECT TBS.* FROM T_BIZ_SETTLEMENT TBS WHERE TBS.SETTLE_STATUS not in('draft','down') AND TBS.DEAL_ID=#{dealId}

SELECT B.USER_NAME,B.USER_ID FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(MIN(TBCS.STEP_NO),-1) STEP_NO,TBS.SETTLE_ID FROM T_BIZ_SETTLEMENT TBS INNER JOIN T_BIZ_DEAL TBD ON TBD.`DEAL_ID`=TBS.`DEAL_ID` INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_STEP TBCS ON TBCS.`CHECK_OBJ_ID`=TBS.SETTLE_ID INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_MAN TBCM ON TBCS.`STEP_ID`=TBCM.`STEP_ID` WHERE TBD.`DEAL_STATUS`='progressAuditing' AND TBCM.`CHECK_STATE`='PENDING' AND TBS.SETTLE_ID =#{settleId} AND TBS.`SETTLE_STATUS`='buildAuditing' GROUP BY TBS.SETTLE_ID ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(TBCS.`STEP_NO`) STEP_NO,TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID,TSU.`USER_ID`,TSU.`USER_NAME` FROM T_BIZ_CHECK_STEP TBCS INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_MAN TBCM ON TBCS.`STEP_ID`=TBCM.`STEP_ID` INNER JOIN T_SYS_USER TSU ON TSU.`USER_ID`=TBCM.`USER_ID` WHERE TBCM.`CHECK_STATE`='PENDING' AND TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID=#{settleId} GROUP BY TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID,TSU.`USER_ID`,TSU.`USER_NAME` ) B ON A.STEP_NO=B.STEP_NO AND A.SETTLE_ID=B.CHECK_OBJ_ID

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT 1
FROM T_BIZ_SETTLEMENT TB INNER JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(MIN(TBCS.STEP_NO),-1) STEP_NO,TBS.SETTLE_ID FROM T_BIZ_SETTLEMENT TBS INNER JOIN T_BIZ_DEAL TBD ON TBD.`DEAL_ID`=TBS.`DEAL_ID` INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_STEP TBCS ON TBCS.`CHECK_OBJ_ID`=TBS.SETTLE_ID INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_MAN TBCM ON TBCS.`STEP_ID`=TBCM.`STEP_ID` WHERE TBD.`DEAL_STATUS`='progressAuditing' AND TBCM.`CHECK_STATE`='PENDING' AND TBS.`SETTLE_STATUS`='buildAuditing' GROUP BY TBS.SETTLE_ID ) A ON TB.SETTLE_ID=A.SETTLE_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(TBCS.`STEP_NO`) STEP_NO,TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID FROM T_BIZ_CHECK_STEP TBCS INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_MAN TBCM ON TBCS.`STEP_ID`=TBCM.`STEP_ID` INNER JOIN T_SYS_USER TSU ON TSU.`USER_ID`=TBCM.`USER_ID` WHERE TSU.`USER_ID`=#{userId} AND TBCM.`CHECK_STATE`='PENDING' GROUP BY TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID ) B ON A.STEP_NO=B.STEP_NO AND A.SETTLE_ID=B.CHECK_OBJ_ID LEFT JOIN T_SYS_DEPT TSD ON TB.DEPT_ID=TSD.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN T_SYS_USER TSU ON TB.USER_ID=TSU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_BIZ_DEAL TBD ON TB.DEAL_ID=TBD.DEAL_ID LEFT JOIN T_BIZ_CONTRACTOR TBC2 ON TBC2.CONT_ID=TBD.CONTRACT_ID )a
UNION ALL
SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT 1
FROM T_BIZ_SETTLEMENT TB INNER JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(MIN(TBCS.STEP_NO),-1) STEP_NO,TBS.SETTLE_ID FROM T_BIZ_SETTLEMENT TBS INNER JOIN T_BIZ_DEAL TBD ON TBD.`DEAL_ID`=TBS.`DEAL_ID` INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_STEP TBCS ON TBCS.`CHECK_OBJ_ID`=TBS.SETTLE_ID INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_MAN TBCM ON TBCS.`STEP_ID`=TBCM.`STEP_ID` WHERE TBD.`DEAL_STATUS`='progressAuditing' AND TBCM.`CHECK_STATE`='PENDING' AND TBS.`SETTLE_STATUS`='buildAuditing' GROUP BY TBS.SETTLE_ID ) A ON TB.SETTLE_ID=A.SETTLE_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(TBCS.`STEP_NO`) STEP_NO,TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID FROM T_BIZ_CHECK_STEP TBCS INNER JOIN T_BIZ_CHECK_MAN TBCM ON TBCS.`STEP_ID`=TBCM.`STEP_ID` INNER JOIN T_SYS_USER TSU ON TSU.`USER_ID`=TBCM.`USER_ID` WHERE TSU.`ENTRUST_USER_ID`=#{userId} AND TBCM.`CHECK_STATE`='PENDING' GROUP BY TBCS.CHECK_OBJ_ID ) B ON A.STEP_NO=B.STEP_NO AND A.SETTLE_ID=B.CHECK_OBJ_ID )b
) c
